ESP8266_IoT.kidsiotState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to KidsIot
ESP8266_IoT.setdata: Connect to ThingSpeak and set data.
ESP8266_IoT.thingSpeakState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to ThingSpeak
ESP8266_IoT.tsLastUploadState: Check if ESP8266 successfully uploaded data to ThingSpeak
ESP8266_IoT.uploadData: upload data. It would not upload anything if it failed to connect to Wifi or ThingSpeak.
ESP8266_IoT.wifiState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to Wifi
